website_summaries.verdict: An all-around sturdy and great-looking choice that also doubles as a table.
pros: Comes pre-assembled, although you’ll need two people to lift the top on
A sturdy choice that offers a lot of storage
We love the cherry top, which doubles as a table
cons: Use pads or cutting boards on this option, as the top scratches easily
You’ll need at least a 31-inch doorway and a fair bit of muscle to get this into your house

customer_reviews.title: Not as bulky as I thought it would be so it's perfect for my small house
customer_reviews.text: Way prettier in person. Not as bulky as I thought it would be so it's perfect for my small house. Very heavy and sturdy. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: suzi trego

customer_reviews.title: Pleased beyond belief
customer_reviews.text: So pleased! it matches our kitchen cabinets perfect and does everything we needed. We have "hazelnut glaze" colored cabinets as currently sold by Home Depot. I did polyurethane the top as other reviewers did and changed the knobs to match my cabinets. Very easy to assemble just my husband and I. No damage whatsoever, it comes on a pallet. Make sure you order 24" stools. It is simply awesome and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Romero

customer_reviews.title: It did NOT disappoint. It arrived promptly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the many glowing reviews it has received. It did NOT disappoint. It arrived promptly, was securely packaged and in perfect condition, and was absurdly easy to assemble. It is my new work table in my art studio and I am absolutely thrilled with it. Much of the storage in my studio is on open shelving, so it is nice to have the cabinets in this island for bulky/unwieldy things and the drawers for various tools. I also love the fact that I can expand the table top for larger projects, or drop the leaves for more space in my studio.
customer_reviews.author: virginia e mcconnell

customer_reviews.title: Almost couldn't get it into the house, but we did and it was so worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen island is beautiful and looks great in my kitchen! When ordering, carefully measure your doors to your house. The delivery man said we needed 30 inches of space and my door was exactly 30 inches wide. When it arrived, the island would not fit through the door! My boyfriend and I spent an entire day removing the doors and part of the door frame to get it in. It was totally worth it because this island is awesome and stores a bunch of our stuff. But just be careful about size because it'll be a pain to return it if you cant fit it into your house
customer_reviews.author: Hope Gofton

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: this is a beautiful piece of furniture. I have it in the center of a very large kitchen and it is definitely the focal point. I have no complaints with the craftsmenship what so ever. It is a rustic off white color with a beautiful wood finish on the top. Only issue is it does scratch on the top easily so if you are using it in a utilitarian way I would caution you to use pads or cutting boards to prevent scratching. Otherwise very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: New family heirloom
customer_reviews.text: I love this table! Just what I was looking for. An island that can also be used as a dinning table. Our home is under 1000 sq ft, so every foot of space matters. The cabinet is super heavy, solid wood, all drawers are easy to use, the table top is shiny, solid wood. So beautiful. Easily our house guests are drawn to this inviting table and pull up a chair right away. Assembly was a breeze. Everything works great. I put less used items in the hard to reach drawers. I read reviews and knew they would be mostly covered by the table top.
customer_reviews.author: Natural Expressions

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Multi-functional Island/table
customer_reviews.text: I downsized to a condo and needed extra drawer and appliance storage in my smaller kitchen so I searched for a piece that could double as a table and storage. This piece is everything I could have wanted and it looks beautiful as well. It has also served as a "project table" . I added two counter height stools, one on each side, and two backless stools for extra seating on the front and back. I placed both of the backless stools on the back side of the unit to pull out when extra seating is needed. I love multi-functional pieces and this is a winner. .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice island, might need two people to set the top because it might damage island
customer_reviews.text: So I just got mine coaster island after a few try because some damage and wrong color item and some discount days later I’m satisfy customer, looks beautiful in my kitchen and is exactly what I expected. I am a big guy this is a two people job at least if you don’t want to damage anything, but installation was simple enough took a few minutes. Would recommend product, at least if you get it intact.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Reyes-Pichardo

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded my kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: The first one we had shipped was damaged, unfortunately and had to wait two weeks to have another shipped to replace it. That meant having two huge boxes taking up my family room for a while. But the second one came with one tiny chip hardly noticeable and it was worth the wait!!! But has given my kitchen a whole new look. It really is a beautiful piece for the money! Also the second delivery man who came and took the first one back and delivered the second was outstanding!!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: MamaO13

customer_reviews.title: This is not ikea
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of furniture, brought our oddly laid out kitchen and living room together and everyone thinks it's part of the original build. It weighs a ton and doesn't move around every time you touch it, the shipping was phenomenal, they way it's packaged is amazing, I was able to accept delivery, take it out of the boxes and foam, move it into my house and have it built alone before my wife even got home. There is VERY limited assembly... Basically the feet, the knobs, and attaching the counter top to the base. Couldn't be happier with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Marcus W Coyle IV

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, gorgeous, so much storage, smooth operation of doors and drawers, heavy, excellent topper. The only drawback is the groove around the top of the table; it gets filled with food. I am filling it with wood filler and putting some old english on it. You will love this piece!
customer_reviews.author: J. Carey

customer_reviews.title: Solid, nice piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made piece of furniture. It's solid wood and the top is really quite beautiful. It's more brown than red, which was perfect for me. In the light, you can see muted reddish hues. The only con is the top overhangs on both sides making utilizing the drawers a little difficult. It was well packaged and the only assembly was putting on the top and screwing in the bun feet and door/drawer handles.
customer_reviews.author: K. Clay

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful Piece of Furniture!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Beautiful Piece of Furniture! It met my expectations and more. The storage is Adequate, a great addition to my area. Since I don't have a large Kitchen I am using it for a dining room table. It will come in great for the Holidays. The Delivery was smooth and it came well packaged. No damage was noticed. Thank You Amazon for a Very Nice Piece of Furniture!
customer_reviews.author: Vandi in Md

customer_reviews.title: but because of the reviews that others have posted about this kitchen island I decided to take the risk - I am so glad I did
customer_reviews.text: its very scary to order something this size without first seeing it, but because of the reviews that others have posted about this kitchen island I decided to take the risk - I am so glad I did, the island is beautiful & I just love it!!!!!! Even better looking than in the photo! Shipping was super fast only 9 days from ordering to being in my kitchen!!!!!! The whole experience from talking to customer service prior to ordering the island & getting emails with tracking info to the trucking company calling to set up delivery time was awesome! If you have any doubts about this island rest assured its a beautiful piece & very well crafted!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: You should check out this island
customer_reviews.text: Yes it is heavy and sturdy but it arrived in only 2 pieces. The base and the top. No pages and pages of instructions. I am amazed at all of the storage space in the island itself. There are a pair of doors on one side with 2 shelves where I now keep my cook books. On the other side of the island there are racks for wine bottles and glasses. On 2 sides there are also racks for spices. One of the best purchases I've ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Adams

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Addition to Our Home
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new kitchen island! It looks awesome in my kitchen! The delivery guys had to unpack the base from the box to get it in my house. We didn’t realize that the hardware pack to bolt the countertop to the base was in that box so it was accidentally discarded. Coaster Customer Service was wonderful. They offered to send me a replacement pack.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget

customer_reviews.title: ... up on my tiny home until I found this great piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: I was about to give up on my tiny home until I found this great piece of furniture. The only part I don't use is the wine glass holder because the spaces are too narrow for my glasswear. The rest is used to the max and organized efficiently. I use it for food preparation and avoid scratching the surface by draping a kitchen cloths over the part I am using, I have 4 stools at the moment but can sit up to 8. I am in love!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... was exactly what we were looking for a the best price around
customer_reviews.text: This island was exactly what we were looking for a the best price around. I ended up making my own top since the one that came with it was too big for our kitchen area. I actually cut up the top and used it for a bar top in my basement. Great price and quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but a few issues with it
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful island, well built and super easy to install everything. I get a lot of compliments on it and I know it will last as long as I do! The only problems I have with it are that my wine glass bottoms are too big for the glass holders; the top sticks out over the drawers, making it hard to get to the back of the drawer or fill it; and I'm covering the wood top with table cloths so that it doesn't get scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Crocker

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: We needed extra counter and storage space in our small kitchen and this will serve our needs very nicely. Item looks great and it appears to be well constructed. As one review said you will all of 30 inches to get into your house. Maybe a bit smaller if unboxed outside.
customer_reviews.author: L. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had my eye on this for quite a while but was undecided if I should buy it or not. I am so glad I bought it! It is beautiful in person! I think the pictures do not do justice. My shipping and delivery experience was awesome the delivery guys even brought it in for me which was a plus since I wouldnt be able to lift it on my own (it is pretty heavy) It came perfectly intact and setting up was a breeze! I highly recommend it! You wont be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Lizeth

customer_reviews.title: Easily scratches  and stains
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kitchen island in May 2019. While it is a beautiful piece, it does not hold up. Being that it is for the kitchen, I expected it to be more resistent yet the wood scratches easily and just by my kids putting a paper plate with an omelet on it, the humidity made the wood look white.
customer_reviews.author: Lilliam Cuevas

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the island is above our expectations. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Bagrox

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Island
customer_reviews.text: Good looking addition to our Kitchen. Quite large - minimum 31 inch doorway need to get in the house after getting out of the packaging. Lots of storage space in the 4 draws, 2 cupboards plus 12 wine bottle storage. Hangers for wine glasses a little tight for our stemmed glasses but they stand upright fine. We feel it is good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I get compliments all the time. Pro: It's lovely and has great storage. The drawers can hold quite a bit too. I love the wine cubbys. Con: The wine glass holder-slots are too narrow for my wine glasses.... So that's wasted space.
customer_reviews.author: hildynyc

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful island. Arrived on time ...but after the first ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful island. Arrived on time ...but after the first time using the leaf the brackets gave way! The screws inside the bracket are not meant to hold this up. We’re lucky my 5 year didn’t get hurt! I contacted the seller and sent pics of what parts I needed but it’s been a week and still nothing. If this was a cheap purchase I would be as upset but I spent good money!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Needs Improvement
customer_reviews.text: Price was good. The product came with alittle different colored white paint on the attachable legs. Also the counter top has many factory flaws, stain job was lazy. The product gets a 2 star instead of one, because I had very little assemble which was great and the shipping company they used was fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Icetrane

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service & product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in April, by July top of island had a warp or bubble. Been sent from manufacturer to amazon and back with no help. I feel the top piece should be repaird/replaced considering the expense of the item and how quickly it became damaged.
customer_reviews.author: C. Curry

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Island
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of furniture looks very expensive. It is so sturdy, you will get nothing but compliments after compliment. Plus it has a lot of extra storage.
customer_reviews.author: gangrene

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy piece of furniture! Read plenty of reviews about how it arrives though as you will do some heavy lifting. We always get compliments on it though!
customer_reviews.author: Karina Nilson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, and absolutely beautiful! No problems whatsoever. The people who delivered it were very nice too. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: The Tudors

customer_reviews.title: I gave it a lower rating as the top scratched VERY easily. I used a handheld vacuum to sweep off ...
customer_reviews.text: This island was fairly simple to assemble as it came in two big pieces. However, I gave it a lower rating as the top scratched VERY easily. I used a handheld vacuum to sweep off the top (it has a soft plastic tip) and it scratched it! The cabinets though seem to be of good construction so I plan on replacing the would top with a more durable material (like stone) down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality control
customer_reviews.text: Item was damaged at the factory had tape markings showing the damage but it was not repaired
customer_reviews.author: Michael Balthazor

customer_reviews.title: Love this Island.
customer_reviews.text: I was so surprised at the quality of this item for the price. Came mostly assembled but it was packed to withstand a tornado!!! Not a scratch on it. Item is much larger than it appears in the photo! Was not aware that it would be dropped at the door but the the deliveryman helped me bring it in. Three cheers for Rac transport!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Nuccio

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, this piece is exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, this piece is exactly as pictured. Is a great piece for my kitchen and gives me so much extra space to work in my kitchen. I have gotten many compliments on it and with getting it on sale it made me love it even more.
customer_reviews.author: annabelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, the freight company that delivered it was easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Baltraven

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this purchase. I looked at several islands and this one I kept coming back to. It delivered yesterday very easy to put together. It looks wonderful in my kitchen , it has a lot of room to store bowls and flatware.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: high quality, beautiful furniture
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece!! High quality. Love it!! Only one issue - don't use UPS Freight!! They are a nightmare (different from regular UPS.) would absolutely but from this seller, but ship differently. My friends cannot believe I bought this lovely piece on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lehman

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this island already! It makes such a difference in my kitchen. It has so much more space than I dreamed it would. The assembly was very simple and didn't take long at all. It did require two people only to lift the top on. I teceibed this before it was guaranteed. The delivery man was super nice. He deserves 5 stars as well. I'm very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Julie N

customer_reviews.title: it's a great piece for the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: One of the drawer doors fell off the day we received it, but we had a handyman repair it. Other than that, it's a great piece for the kitchen. It matched my cabinets perfectly. Just open the box and it's almost done! No small parts thankfully!!
customer_reviews.author: Maribeth R. Napleton

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm enjoying my island very much.. it is high end fancy.. lots of storage.. it is huge with drop leaf sides.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and it is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I was looking for. Easy to set up and it is beautiful! We need a large island and this did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: DONNA M

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this island
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this island! We hunted for months to find something to replace our kitchen table that had storage! This is very well made and has plenty of usable storage. The wood is good quality and it looks fabulous in our kitchen. If you are looking for an island with storage, this is the one. The delivery was perfect! Another great product from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: This thing is wonderful. The reverse side has a wine rack & ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is wonderful. The reverse side has a wine rack & wine glass storage and a couple shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Island
customer_reviews.text: The island looks gorgeous in my kitchen. But, the chairs are not well made; there was a crack in the wood on one of the chairs. On another chair the insert had to be glued back to the base. All that being said, it looks good, but quality of workmanship was a little lacking.
customer_reviews.author: beejaybee

customer_reviews.title: Great island
customer_reviews.text: Very nice island. Came pretty much assembled. Only had to put bottom post knobs on and counter top. Its a two person job. I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: HOLLY R.

customer_reviews.title: Love this piece
customer_reviews.text: Love this piece. Arrived on time, packaged beautifully. My husband attached the top and feet. Very nice addition to my kitchen. I can put 6 counter stools around it. I got the off white with cherry top.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer sheri. 51

customer_reviews.title: I am ABSOLUTELY satisfied with this island
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous of such a big purchase without seeing it in real life. I am ABSOLUTELY satisfied with this island!! It is extremely well built and sturdy. I even noticed parts that are real wood that generally are manufactured wood. Larger than I thought too. It is a wonderful addition to my home and I am very pleased. Packaging was very good as well. No damage on the packaging either. Delivery guy was very nice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coaster island met our expectations and beyond, made well ...
customer_reviews.text: Coaster island met our expectations and beyond,made well and was packed very well. Heads up there were parts taped under island. Heavy.. Need 2 or three to carry in. We now look for coaster furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: item arrived on time &intact. the island was easy to assembly since the base cabinet came intact & all that was needed was to attach the top, legs & movable shelves. material look to be made out of mainly real wood. there are some areas that look to be possible particle board but less than what i was expecting so i am happy. fyi it is very heavy will need @least 2people to move, etc.
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: nice, but it was broken.
customer_reviews.text: It was badly cracked. We decided to buy wood glue and a wood clamp and fix it rather than endure cleaning up masses of packaging and waiting around for delivery people. If it wasn't broken it would be a great item.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Forsythe

customer_reviews.title: I love it-a little larger than it looks and I wish ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it-a little larger than it looks and I wish the sides didn't stick out over the drawers, but it is made great!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise DiClemente

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well built and plenty of workspace
customer_reviews.text: Great island, huge but great. This is definitely what I was looking for in size. The top does hang over the drawers like others have talked about, it is not an issue to me. The island is very sturdy, well built and I am definitely pleased with the purchase. I would recommend that you measure your doorways to make sure you can bring this inside, and which door it will fit through. We did not do this, took it to the kitchen door, it didn't fit. We had to carry it all the way to the front, it is HEAVY! The base of the island comes in one piece, the top is the only thing that is not attached.
customer_reviews.author: SMAtlanta

customer_reviews.title: I love the new island
customer_reviews.text: I love the new island. Its a solid piece but i do plan on putting some sort of coating on the countertop such as a polyurethane finish since it seems to scratch easily. It is larger than i had expected and has lots of storage. Also its a plus for me that the cabinet doors are tough to open as i have a one year old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best deal on the web.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most awesome piece of furniture I have ever bought on line. We love it. Super heavy duty perfect in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet little Schnoodles of Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this island with four of the Boraam 41229 Kyoto Swivel Stool, 29-Inch, Cherry. I wasn't sure how they would look together, but they do look beautiful. The island is nice quality and it came in a reasonable amount of time. There was not much assembling to do and what little there was, wasn't difficult. There were no defects that I can see. I would order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: sassy girl

customer_reviews.title: But when I finally received my kitchen island I was happy it large and beautiful and had a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: I felt it took to long to be deliver. But when I finally received my kitchen island I was happy it large and beautiful and had a lot of special features. I highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Easy to assemble if you have 2 strong people. Top was very heavy to lift. I have had many compliments on how beautiful it is!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny K

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Truly love it! One of the "feet" missed the antique process and sticks out like a sore thumb , but otherwise, it has been really useful.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! And HUGE, by old house standards.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece of furniture. Delivery was as scheduled and arrived in perfect condition largely because the packing is incredibly thorough - and adds 4-6 inches to the width if you don't remove the Styrofoam. You WILL need bare minimum 30" doorways and 2 very strong adults, or in our case 3 adequately healthy adults (and a bottle of painkillers, later) to get this in place. Even with the 30" doorway we had to remove a screen door and pull/pry all but the outer cardboard shell out of the box in order to get it through.Barely.
customer_reviews.author: CindyG

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife, happy life.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and my wife loves it. I replaced the feet with rolling casters and it's all the more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Kimes

customer_reviews.title: It is a very nicely put together center piece
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nicely put together center piece, although in order to utilize it, we had to purchase a glass top which ran us another $100. The wine section is really not "any size bottle friendly" and could not be used as such in our home, so that side is being reviewed by my husband to see if he can create something usable on that side. You will also need small size bar stools for seating due to no leg room on the non-extension sides.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Roldan

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this. It is of much better quality than ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this. It is of much better quality than I expected. It looks exactly like in the picture. The top is damaged but the company is sending a new top so no big deal. This was so worth every penny. I have always needed an island in my kitchen and this works better than great. I am very please with this Island and would tell others not to hesitate to purchase. Comes in two boxes and very easy to put together. Just be advised it is a heavy product but that is what makes it so great.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B.

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen island!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this several months ago and we couldn't be happier with it! Everyone that has come over has loved this island. It is heavy and the quality is just great. We are so happy we purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: LauraT

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this. I get so many compliments on it. This is one very solid piece of furniture. After an initial upset when shipped a defective table top (as someone else reviewed), Amazon exchanged it quickly. That was definitely a manufacturing problem, and a call to the company was no help. Not friendly customer service. I'm glad Amazon was so great with the exchange. The table top is rich and shiny, but the surface scratches very easy. Use placemats and don't place anything directly on unprotected surface. I regularly treat it to moisturize / protect the real wood laminate.
customer_reviews.author: Peter P.

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE IT and have many
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong color but I made it work. I absolutely LOVE IT and have many, many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Benchley

customer_reviews.title: I would give it 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought the coaster large scale island it is beautiful! The only problem is by the seam of table top it is bubbled up, it has made me very sad, have only had it 1 month. Do not know what to do about it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Love this kitchen island
customer_reviews.text: I'm been looking for a while for a kitchen island that serves as extra work space, storage and a family can sit around for meals. I'm very happy with this island. The cherry top is beautiful and the cabinet is very pretty. The drawers work very smoothly. Its a substantial island. I had it shipped and it did come with one of the doors damaged but I'm hoping the seller will send me a replacement door.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Swartz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, came very well packaged. Needed 4 people to get it in the house. But I like it
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Russell

customer_reviews.title: Love the look but a couple little issues
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this in my kitchen. It seems to be a very sturdy piece of furniture...so far anyway...we've only had it for about 8 months. I just have a couple issues with it. The drawers do not open and close smoothly. In fact, one of them we just don't even use because it is so difficult to close back up. Also, the spot where you can hang wine glasses from, does not fit any of my wine glasses, margarita glasses, etc. It might work for champagne flutes but that's probably about it. All that being said, I don't regret the purchase but I do want people to know about those funtional issues that I've had with it.
customer_reviews.author: J Torres

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful in my kitchen!! Easy to assemble but VERY heavy!! The UPS driver couldn't get his semi truck into our drive way so we met him in a close by town and he helped us load it into my truck. Other than that no problems at all. I would recommend buying this island. It's everything and more than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Jo Stuckey

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous addition to my kitchen upgrade. Highly recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Carole Hysmith

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, arrived undamaged
customer_reviews.text: It's absolutely gorgeous! Solid, sturdy, arrived undamaged, we are in kitchen island love!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged, however nice piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of furniture, unfortunately the top arrived broken. Otherwise, would have loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle L. Eckert

customer_reviews.title: love this I found matching chairs on amazon too love ...
customer_reviews.text: love this I found matching chairs on amazon too love the price very hard to find things like this anywhere else
customer_reviews.author: Shirely Coffman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome island!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This island arrived right on time and was even more then we expected.The quality and craftsmanship far exceeded our expectations.I would recommend to anyone looking for an island to give this company a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Melodie Gaffney

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS GREAT IN OUR KITCHEN
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and is everything we asked for, The assembly was easy. We would recommend this to anyone. love it
customer_reviews.author: bjb

customer_reviews.title: Large island
customer_reviews.text: It is a large cabinet and really pretty. I do intend to put an additional finish on top as it gets tiny scratches if you put anything on it. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: kay

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful very pleased nicest piece of furniture in our house
customer_reviews.author: phillip singer

customer_reviews.title: All pieces perfect. Put together in 20 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Came together perfectly. All pieces perfect. Put together in 20 minutes. Love it!!!!!! Not as heavy as folks say. Two guys carried it with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: M. Carey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Arrived on time and assembly went very well. Well constructed. Recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: David A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied, exactly what we were looking for in an island. The island is very well constructed and weighs about 200 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: John Maslowski

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal product, so well built, very heavy. I am truly happy with it. I ordered it and it got to the delivery station early, they called and I was able to get it before Easter which came in handy because I decided last minute to host. The delivery guys left it in the garage and my husband and I were able to bring it inside. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Narine Barone

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: This has become the centerpiece of our renovated kitchen. Plenty of storage inside and the wine storage area fits plenty of bottles. We have comfortably fit 6-8 people around this table. Very easy to put together. Only issue we had was trying to match stools to the tabletop (ended up staining some unfinished stools on my own). Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: the drawers are only 30% useful. The large overhang impedes the usefulness of the ...
customer_reviews.text: This island is very large complete with the Cherry Wood top secured. The only problem is that when the top is attached, the drawers are only 30% useful. The large overhang impedes the usefulness of the four drawers. Mind also that this island is very heavy. The packing slip had this at a total of 302 lbs. Lastly I'm not happy this product was made in Vietnam. PS the delivery guys were courteous and quick.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl S.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I use it as a counter for my business. It is sturdy and adjustable. My customers are always commenting on how nice the counter looks.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, well packaged, great value for the money. Only problem was as other people posted,is the wine rack does not hold regular size wine glasses. This is an easy fix, simply remove one of the center hangers and adjust the other two center hangers to accommodate larger glass.
customer_reviews.author: Malysone Souvanna

customer_reviews.title: You can find better!!
customer_reviews.text: We despise this island! The drawers do not hold much and do not open out very far. The storage is pretty limited and it feels cheaply made. This island is not practical for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy piece of furniture, great value for the money. We had to wait a couple extra days for delivery but it was well worth it. When the top is not extended it is 42" L fully extended it is 66" L The color is buttermilk but it has a yellowish tint to it. It is still a nice color. The top does have a decrotative crack around the edge like my kitchen table which does collect food so I would suggest getting a piece of glass for it. It is on the bigger side, I would recommend this to anyone with an open concept floor plan or a large kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Melissa West

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Island
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up, but you will need assistance. This island is very sturdy. Please measure your door entrance before ordering. I reside in a older home, where the doors are not large, nor was my kitchen entrance large. That was my fault, it was work but we got it into my house. Overall I enjoy my piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: MilMil

customer_reviews.title: Horrible island! Over spray of black paint
customer_reviews.text: Horrible island! Over spray of black paint, wood splitting, not a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Neal Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is great and sturdy and everything i was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Stormin da castle

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I like the island but I can't use it, because the top is defective.
customer_reviews.author: ALFRED A. CITRANO, JR.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my island. It's exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Reevaluate the seller
customer_reviews.text: I received information today that the top will be replaced. That makes me so happy! If that is fixed then this is the perfect island for me and I will feel like its worth five stars. It's beautiful and holds everything I need. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Annette M

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: It's match with my kitchen well. There are roomy for all of us. Nice!!!
customer_reviews.author: Donald Huu Ha

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT IS GREAT.  UPS FREIGHT DELIVERY IS A SCAM
customer_reviews.text: WE RECEIVED THE PRODUCT AND IT WAS A SNAP TO PUT TOGETHER. EVERYTHING FIT AND IT IS LOOKS GOOD AND IS HEAVY. HOWEVER, ABOUT TWO WEEKS LATER, WE RECEIVED A BILL FROM UPS FREIGHT FOR $128.50 (IN ADDITION TO THE ORIGINAL PURCHASE PRICE). UPS IS CLAIMING THAT NO ONE WAS HOME WHEN THEY FIRST ATTEMPTED TO DELIVER AND THAT THEY HAD TO "RE-DELIVER". UPS NEVER CONTACTED US TO TELL US WHEN THEY WOULD BE DELIVERING. BESIDES, THEY ONLY DELIVER TO THE FRONT DOOR. THEY COULD HAVE JUST DROPPED IT OFF.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Huff

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Kitchen Island
customer_reviews.text: This piece of furniture is both functional and beautiful. I have received many compliments on it, and it ties our decor together beautifully. I love the contrast between the buttermilk color on the bottom and the wooden top. I was very pleased with the condition in which the island arrived, and it was easy for my husband to assemble with just a little help from me. This was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Asbe25

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Island
customer_reviews.text: The Kitchen Island by Coaster is ABSOLUTELY georgeous. It is on the bigger side but the craftsman ship is beautiful. The only problem we had was that one of the draws was not attached to the bracket -so we will have to fix ourselves. Otherwise, a beautiful piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

product_meta.title: Slater 2-drawer 2-door Kitchen Island with Drop Leaves Brown and Buttermilk
product_meta.description: Size:TableThe Slater kitchen island is an all-in-one dining or food preparation and storage piece. This transitional has drawers for silverware and closing cabinets to hide hanging wine glasses. The table top is sized enough to prep salads and appetizers. Drop down leaves extend so everyone can gather around to sample baklava or brownies. Finished in brown and creamy buttermilk for a distinctive addition to your home.
feature_bullets: Storage: Cabinets and drawers(go half way through), spice rack and wine storage (not removable)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars158 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
